resources.string: After receiving amnesty for their past crimes, Dominic, Brian and the rest of their team return to the US to live normal lives while Deckard Shaw, a rogue UKSF and MI6 assassin seeking to avenge his comatose younger brother Owen Shaw, puts the team back in danger.

Tom, Darcy and their families gather for an ultimate destination wedding on a private island in the Philippines. Just as the couple are away arguing about the wedding, their guests are taken hostage. The pirates demand $45 million dollars from Darcys wealthy father Robert.

After a slave named Peter is whipped nearly to death, he escapes a Louisiana plantation by outmaneuvering cold-blooded hunters and makes his way north, where he enlists in the Union Army. The film is based on the true story of a runaway slave named Gordon.

New York, Halloween Eve. A year after the events in Woodsboro, Blackmore University student Jason Carvey, disguised as Ghostface, brutally murders his professor, Laura Crane, outside a bar. Together with his friend Greg, he is going to kill the sisters Sam and Tara Carpenter, "finishing the Richie movie."

The main characters of the film are New York policeman Nick Spitz and his hairdresser wife Audrey. In honor of the 15th wedding anniversary, the couple booked a tour of Europe. On the plane, Audrey meets billionaire Charles Cavendish, who invites the couple to join a party on his family yacht.
